displayProperties.name: Shielded Foes
displayProperties.description: You will face combatants with [Solar] Solar shields.

displayProperties.name: Shielded Foes
displayProperties.description: You will face combatants with [Arc] Arc shields.

displayProperties.name: Shielded Foes
displayProperties.description: You will face combatants with [Void] Void shields.

displayProperties.name: Shielded Foes
displayProperties.description: You will face combatants with [Solar] Solar and [Arc] Arc shields.

displayProperties.name: Shielded Foes
displayProperties.description: You will face combatants with [Solar] Solar and [Void] Void shields.

displayProperties.name: Shielded Foes
displayProperties.description: You will face combatants with [Arc] Arc and [Void] Void shields.

displayProperties.name: Shielded Foes
displayProperties.description: You will face combatants with [Solar] Solar, [Arc] Arc, and [Void] Void shields.
Prior to each damage phase, break **all four** of Taniks' **thrusters** and deposit all Nuclear charges.
Over the course of the encounter, **each Guardian** must equip **each augment** once. Await an augment deactivation before beginning the changeover. Play in pairs, shadowing a leader's rotation.
No Guardian may shoot the same **Oracle**. Rotate positions.
Complete the encounter without killing any Cyclops that spawn in the Harpy boss's presence. Cyclops that spawn in other areas, and during the final sprint, can be killed.
All players must **refresh** their **Enlightened** buff at approximately the **same time**. However, the team may be split up at different tethers.
Guardians must not take damage from Shuro Chi's **Arc Blast**.
**Knights** must be killed in the rooms they spawn in and are not permitted to enter the main arena.
During the Atheon encounter, each **Guardian** may only destroy one **Oracle** per set. As such, the Aegis wielder will need to partake.
During the Dominion encounter, the **primary crux** may only be destroyed once per glyphs phase.
Throughout the Exhibition encounter, each Guardian may only defeat one **Disciple's Hourglass**. Choose one to skip.
Guardians may **only** deposit **10 motes** at a time.
For the duration of the Acquisition encounter, each wave of **[Stagger] Unstoppable Champions** must be defeated within 5 seconds of one another or not at all.
During the Templar encounter, **prevent** the Templar from **teleporting** at all costs.
Cleanse all nine plates, kill all nine Knights, and kill all Ogres **before** damaging Kalli.
During the Confluxes encounter, destroy Wyverns **only while they're sacrificing themselves** to a conflux.
During the Gatekeeper encounter, destroy the Praetorian Minotaur and Wyvern **simultaneously**.
Don't use airlocks to space Atraks's copies.
During the Caretaker encounter, only **one symbol** energy charge may be carried **at a time** per Guardian.
Don't kill smol ogres, **only** kill **big boi**.
Guardians must not shoot the same eye twice.
Bypass Crypt Security while passing the **Operator Augment** to each fireteam member. Each Operator should activate two panels each over three damage phases.
During the Sanctified Mind encounter, bank **30 motes** at each Vex relay. At each relay, all 30 motes must be deposited **within 10 seconds** of one another.
Guardians may not hold the same "Brand" in **sequence**.
Guardians may not hold the claiming "Brand" for longer than 5 seconds.
If a Guardian holds **Golgoroth's gaze**, they must be standing in a **Pool of Reclaimed Light** when another Guardian acquires it.
Unless "Torn Between Dimensions", Guardians may not activate the same plate per phase.
Guardians can not kill the same Light-Eater Knight or Light-Eater Ogre.

displayProperties.name: Illuminated Torment
displayProperties.description: Guardians may kill **Tormenters** only when affected by **Field of Light**.

displayProperties.name: Crossfire
displayProperties.description: Shoot across the gap to trigger teammates' slingshot cruxes. Only use slingshots to cross the gap.

displayProperties.name: Cosmic Equilibrium
displayProperties.description: Move all terraformed (light) planets right and resonant (dark) planets left. Requires two Planetary Shift phases per plate.

displayProperties.name: All Hands
displayProperties.description: Each Guardian must link a light and dark node prior to each damage phase.
Always **preserve** the **Chalice of Light** before igniting a lamp.
Cross the bridge while it is fading. Coordinate with your fireteam and control the bridge's state accordingly.
Every Guardian must hold the **Chalice of Light** before any Guardian holds it a subsequent time.
Guardians may only break Crota's shield in a single attempt. Bear multiple swords.
